title: Apr. 18, 2025
snippet: The Parable of a Brazilian programmer
content: This week was spring break!! I had so many plans and activities lined up, but sometimes, plans change.
and I can't lie... I was initially really upset about it. Especially cause I know whose fault it was for me getting sick (cough cough Jerry ლ(ಠ_ಠლ)). but regardless, things happen.

it's been a slow week, but thats never a bad thing. in times like these, i try to enjoy the moments of peace and quiet. there will come a time when i won't be able to slow down and enjoy simple things, so in the meantime, i will try to take it all in (inbetween sniffles and coughs ofc).
P.S. the old chinese farmer said it best: "Good news? Bad news? Who can say."

title: Feb. 25, 2025
snippet: Tomorrow marks one month since my return from Brazil...
content: Tomorrow marks one month since my return from Brazil and I’m still so happy to have familial ties to such a beautiful country and people...
I’m working on an AI program to help some of my favorite students learn Python!
P.S. always remember that you can always find love around you if you just look.

title: Jan. 03, 2025
snippet: Happy New Year and To New Beginnings!
content: Happy New Year and To New Beginnings!
I’m writing this as I build the website. These blog posts will be mostly about code projects, art, music, etc.
I'm excited for the new year and all to come.
P.S. Don’t forget to tell your friends and family you love them today.
